Title: Nineteen Sixty Eight.

Description: Sen. Eugene J. McCarthy's own account of the year 1968, a year in which he challenged and unseated a sitting US President and made a fundamental contribution to the ending of a disasterous, and undeclared, war conducted by a president who was assuming near-dictatorial powers in the pursuit of that illegal war..
